# Audio

## Properties

| Property              | Type     | Required     | Nullable | Defined by                                 |
| --------------------- | -------- | ------------ | -------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| [id](#id)         | `string` | **Required** | No       | (this schema)                              |
| [url](#url)         | `string` | **Required** | No       | (this schema)                              |
| [type](#type)         | `enum` (EDN: key / JS: string)   | **Required** | No       | (this schema)                              |
| `*`                   | any      | Additional   | Yes      | this schema _allows_ additional properties |


{{ site.models | where: "name", "ce-id" | first }}


### url

- is **required**
- type: `string`
- URI of a audio resource. To make Content-Objects independent from external resources, you can use Data URI ([Wikipedia-Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_URI_scheme)).

### type

- is **required**
- json-type: `string` -> `"audio"`
- edn-type: `key` -> `:audio`

## Example

{% capture audio_ce %}
{:id "2019-08-04T11-53-39-ce44",
  :type :audio,
  :url "data:audio/ogg;base64,"}
{% endcapture %}
